thread.section_title: Biz2Credit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biz2Credit | biz2credit.com
thread.title: Martin

author: Martin
title: Martin
text: I was pretty skeptical obtaining funding from a source that is not a bank and I'm happy to say that my experience with Biz2Credit has been great so far. The process was very easy and all of my questions were appropriately and promptly answered. As soon as I was finished with all of my skeptical investigating and gave the OK, I was funded the same day. Dean, the Funding Specialist who helped me, was fantastic!!!
